caption:
This #WorldWaterDay, we want to acknowledge the vital link between healthy water systems and finished products for our consumers to enjoy. 

Over the last year, we’ve celebrated the completion of two water stewardship projects, near our Beckton and Leeds sites, delivered through our partnership with @TheRiversTrust. Valuing water is a fundamental part of our sustainability strategy, and we look forward to continuing working with The Rivers Trust to make more of our local water systems healthier💧
